pageContext.claim: “To defeat these transnational gangs, we must fully and completely secure the border. That means more law enforcement, closing legal loopholes, ending catch-and-release, ending sanctuary cities, and finishing the border wall, which we will do.”
pageContext.analysis: Most drugs smuggled into the United States from the southern border come through legal ports of entry, hidden inside vehicles. Drug cartels also dig tunnels underneath the border to ply their trade.
